name: ppOmeter
description:
Welcome to ppOmeter!

This application is made by me, u/GrowPoneReddit.
If you like this app and want me to make more, follow me!

NOTE:

Don't drag this application to anywhere outside the folder. If you do that, the app won't work anymore. (You can of course create a shortcut to the app and drag that somewhere else.

To use this app without flaws, complete these steps:

1. Open ProductSans...ttf and click install
2. Close it when it's done

That's it.

Thanks for reading!
